casebody.data:
STATE
v.
CARTER. No. COA07-320. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed November 6, 2007. Certification Date November 26, 2007. Appeal from Wilson (05CRS55743, 05CRS56047, 06CRS52399).

Cases Reported Without Published Opinion. We vacate case number 05CRS55743 and remand case numbers 05CRS56047 and 06CRS52399 for a new restitution award.
